item.title: 常用javascript方法整理之数字千分位格式化
item.description: 场景 > 使用千分位格式化金额，更正式的显示 效果 思路 1.分割整数位和小数位，处理小数位补零，或者四舍五入 2.获取整数位的长度 按3分割 插入 , 号 3.

item.title: 测试文章-自动部署测试
item.description: 自动部署测试Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub. Quick Start Create a new post $ hexo new "My New Post" More info: Writing Run server $ hexo server More info:
